patterns: When can I start applying for college admission?
When is the deadline for college admission applications?
responses: The application process for college admission will start on January 24, 2022. You will be able to submit your application from that date onwards.
The deadline for college admission applications is April 24, 2022. Make sure to complete and submit your application before this date to ensure consideration for admission.

patterns: Tell me about computer science courses.
What courses are available for business majors?
responses: We offer a variety of computer science courses, covering topics such as algorithms, programming languages, and data structures.
For business majors, we have courses like Marketing Strategy, Financial Management, and Business Ethics.

patterns: When are your customer support hours?
responses: Our customer support team is available from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.
You can reach us for assistance between 9 AM and 6 PM on weekdays.

patterns: Can I transfer to your university?
Are there any specific requirements for transfer students?
responses: Yes, we welcome transfer students! The application process for transfer students involves submitting your transcripts, course descriptions, and other relevant documents.
Transferring to our university is possible. Make sure to provide your previous college transcripts and course descriptions when applying as a transfer student.

patterns: I'm an international student. How can I apply?
What's the application process for international students?
responses: We're excited to welcome international students! The application process for international students is similar to domestic students. You'll need to provide English proficiency scores and relevant immigration documents.
International students are an important part of our community. Please ensure that you provide English proficiency scores and necessary immigration documents during the application process.
